original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2176)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2176)@</color>召喚一群神鳶，在長方形範圍內，交錯投下少量石彈，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2176)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2176)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2176)@</color> summons a group of divine kites to drop a small number of stone bullets staggered within the rectangular area to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2176)@</color><color=#80cc00> </color>Inflict physical damage to the enemy.
